info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 13 at 6:13PM CDT until June 13 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
info.description:
FFWPAH
The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Central Vanderburgh County in southwestern Indiana...
* Until 1015 PM CDT.
* At 613 PM CDT, Radar and rain gauges show a narrow area of 3 to 6 inches of rain on the western side of Evansville. Additional moderate to heavy rain is anticipated. Numerous swift water rescues are underway. Conditions deteriorate significantly over a short distance. Motorists are urged to avoid travel in the area.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for western Evansville including the Mechanicsville, Red Bank, Airport and Harwood neighborhoods. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Evansville and Kasson.
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR WESTERN EVANSVILLE INCLUDING THE MECHANICSVILLE, RED BANK, AIRPORT AND HARWOOD NEIGHBORHOODS
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 10:15 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 10:15 PM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR WESTERN EVANSVILLE INCLUDING THE MECHANICSVILLE, RED BANK, AIRPORT AND HARWOOD NEIGHBORHOODS
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 10:15 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 10:15 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
